ack.p: We are incredibly grateful to Yannis Michalakis and Renaud Vitalis for their stimulating discussions on genetic bottlenecks and thorough review of the manuscript. We thank Brandy Russell at the CDC for providing the virus strains used in these studies. We are grateful to Andrew Routh for his kind assistance with data analysis. We would also like to acknowledge Janet Webster for her thoughtful review of the manuscript. We much appreciate Yves Janin, Jean-Pierre Levraud, and Gabriella Passoni for their collaborations and enjoyable discussions. Finally, we are indebted to the animal care technicians and other technical staff at the Pasteur Institute, without whom this work would not have been possible.
